thread.section_title: Zicasso Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zicasso | www.zicasso.com
thread.title: Anne

author: Anne
title: Anne
text: This service was absolutely amazing! We were matched with two great (but different) travel agencies to help us plan our perfect trip to Thailand. It was nice having two clearly different options/trips to choose from. My parents recommended Zicasso to me after they used it to plan their trip to Italy. They are pickier travelers than my boyfriend and I and were absolutely raving about how great this website and service is. Since our trip, we've recommended it to probably 5 or 6 other couples. All have had just as great of an experience as us. Cannot wait to have a reason to use Zicasso again!
